markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Jahsi](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1541) **Source** [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 11 **Perception** +14; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +17, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +14, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +14 **Str** +4 **Dex** +4 **Con** +1 **Int** +1 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +3 **Items** _+1 [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_, gold jewelry, _+1 [longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76)_ (20 arrows), [Splint Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=11) --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +16 **Ref** +17 **Will** +15 **HP** 135 **Glimpse of Redemption** **Trigger** An enemy damages one of Jahsi's allies within 15 feet of him. **Effect** The foe must choose one: The ally is unharmed by the triggering damage, or the ally gains resistance 10 against the triggering damage, and the enemy is [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) until the end of its next turn.
**Divine Providence** **Trigger** Jahsi rolls a success on a Will save against an enemy's effect. **Effect** Jahsi gets a critical success instead. --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** _disrupting cold iron dagger_ +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+7 piercing plus 1d6 positive to undead **Melee** _silver dagger_ +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d4+7 piercing **Ranged** _longbow_ +19 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 1d8+3 piercing **Ranged** _disrupting cold iron dagger_ +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+7 piercing plus 1d6 positive to undead **Ranged** _silver dagger_ +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d4+7 piercing **Champion Devotion Spells** DC 25, 2 Focus Points - **4th** [Lay on Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=395), [Litany Against Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=397) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 24 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Disrupt Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=79), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330) **Woodland Stride** The Ekujae guardian ignores difficult terrain from plants.
name: Jahsi

text: Jahsi Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 34 Unspecific Lore : DC 32 Specific Lore : DC 29 Jahsi Source Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders pg. 11 Perception +14; low-light vision Languages Common, Elven, Mwangi Skills Athletics +14, Diplomacy +17, Nature +14, Religion +16, Survival +14 Str +4 Dex +4 Con +1 Int +1 Wis +2 Cha +3 Items +1 disrupting cold iron dagger , +1 striking silver dagger , gold jewelry, +1 longbow (20 arrows), Splint Mail --- AC 28 Fort +16 Ref +17 Will +15 HP 135 Glimpse of Redemption Reaction Trigger An enemy damages one of Jahsi's allies within 15 feet of him. Effect The foe must choose one: The ally is unharmed by the triggering damage, or the ally gains resistance 10 against the triggering damage, and the enemy is enfeebled 2 until the end of its next turn. Divine Providence Reaction Trigger Jahsi rolls a success on a Will save against an enemy's effect. Effect Jahsi gets a critical success instead. --- Speed 30 feet Melee Single Action disrupting cold iron dagger +19 (Agile, Magical, versatile S), Damage 1d4+7 piercing plus 1d6 positive to undead Melee Single Action silver dagger +19 (Agile, Magical, versatile S), Damage 2d4+7 piercing Ranged Single Action longbow +19 (deadly d10, Magical, range increment 100 feet, reload 0, volley 30 feet), Damage 1d8+3 piercing Ranged Single Action disrupting cold iron dagger +19 (Agile, Magical, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4+7 piercing plus 1d6 positive to undead Ranged Single Action silver dagger +19 (Agile, Magical, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 2d4+7 piercing Champion Devotion Spells DC 25, 2 Focus Points - 4th Lay on Hands, Litany Against Wrath Primal Innate Spells DC 24 - Cantrips (4th) Dancing Lights, Detect Magic, Disrupt Undead, Tanglefoot Woodland Stride The Ekujae guardian ignores difficult terrain from plants.
